name: Chapter 3 – Card 20: Chapter Finale – Torn Map Piece
description: Flames have scarred this final clue, but what remains points beyond Mahé's shores to distant islands where The quest reaches its ultimate conclusion. The arrow indicates Praslin, where new adventures begin.

attributes.value: Bridge between chapters - the journey continues to new islands

properties.clue: Chapter 4 Teaser: 'Where Coco de Mer grows, greater treasures await discovery'
visualElements: Clear arrow pointing toward new island
Praslin island outline visible on map
